author: sibkatya
content:
`engine_getBlobsV2` metrics proposal:

`beacon_engine_getBlobsV2_requests_total` - Total number of engine_getBlobsV2 requests to an execution layer (Counter)
`beacon_engine_getBlobsV2_responses_total` - Total number of engine_getBlobsV2 successful responses from an execution layer (Couter)

Do we need to count null responses as well? They are considered to be a successful result.
https://github.com/ethereum/execution-apis/blob/main/src/engine/osaka.md#response-1
